java.lang.Object

com.here.platform.location.dataloader.core.TransformingTileLoader<S,T>
com.here.platform.location.dataloader.core.javadsl.TransformingTileLoader<S,T>
Type Parameters:
S - The input type of the mapping function
T - The output type of the mapping function
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataLoader<TileId,T>, TileLoader<T>
public class TransformingTileLoader<S,T> extends com.here.platform.location.dataloader.core.TransformingTileLoader<S,T>
Deprecated.
Use methods based on OptimizedMapLayers instead. Since SDK 2.54.
Transforms the output of the source tile loader by applying a mapping function to it.

param: inner The source tile loader param: mapper The mapping function
